definition: Itsukushima island in Hiroshima prefecture, Japan, with a famous shrine
Itsukujima shrine in Hiroshima prefecture, Japan

sentences.english: And I would like to visit the Itsukushima Shinto Shrine there.
sentences.chinese: 我還想去看看那兒的嚴島神社。

sentences.english: The island of Itsukushima, in the Seto inland sea, has been a holy place of Shintoism since the earliest times.
sentences.chinese: 嚴島位於瀨戶內海，自古以來一直是神道教的聖地。
